thread.title: ‘Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package’ Now Available
thread.title_full: ‘Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package’ Now Available

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: ‘Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package’ Now Available
text:
Request a Quote ‘Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package’ Now Available 
Magic Kingdom® Park has announced a new premium event that will take place during this year’s Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Parties. 
Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package , which will be available on most party nights, will provide guests with some VIP experiences at an additional charge. You’ll receive: Preferred viewing inside Town Square for the first Mickey’s “Boo-to-You” Halloween Parade Preferred viewing for Happy HalloWishes Fireworks spectacular at Tomorrowland® Terrace where a dessert party will also be provided featuring: Themed desserts Non-alcoholic drinks 
Pricing for the Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package is $69 per adult and $39 per child (ages 3-9). Space is limited, so please contact your Magic Maker® to check on availability for your party date. Here are a couple important reminders about the experience: Admission to Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Party is a special ticketed event and is not included with admission to Magic Kingdom® park or this package. The Happy HalloWishes Dessert Premium Package is available on the following nights: Sep. 15, 18, 20, 22, 25, 27; Oct. 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 9, 12, 13, 15, 16, 18, 20, 22, 23, 25, 27, 29, 31; and Nov. 1. Entertainment is subject to change or cancellation without notice. In the event of inclement weather, the parade and/or fireworks may be delayed or cancelled. However, the dessert party will occur regardless of the weather. Reserved viewing for Mickey’s “Boo-to-You” Halloween Parade is for the early performance only. Seating is not provided at the preferred parade viewing. Wheelchairs and Electronic Conveyance Vehicles (ECVs) can be accommodated. Disney dining plan entitlements may not be redeemed for this event. Offer may not be combined with any other discounts or promotions. There are a limited number of tickets available for this event.
